QueryResult.text: SELECT lv.ID,lv.LOOKUP_TYPE,lv.LOOKUP_CODE,lv.SORT_ORDER,lv.NAME,lv.DESCRIPTION,lv.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM cmn_lookups_v lv WHERE lv.lookup_type = 'CMN_LIC_RIGHT_TYPE' AND lv.lookup_code in ('creator','participant','studioDev','viewer') AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT COV.VALUE FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES COV,CMN_OPTIONS CO WHERE COV.OPTION_ID = CO.ID AND OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_VIEW_LIC_TYPE' AND COV.VALUE = 'new') UNION SELECT lv.ID,lv.LOOKUP_TYPE,lv.LOOKUP_CODE,lv.SORT_ORDER,lv.NAME,lv.DESCRIPTION,lv.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM cmn_lookups_v lv WHERE lv.lookup_type = 'CMN_LIC_RIGHT_TYPE' AND lv.lookup_code in ('full','restricted','vo') AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT COV.VALUE FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES COV,CMN_OPTIONS CO WHERE COV.OPTION_ID = CO.ID AND OPTION_CODE = 'CMN_VIEW_LIC_TYPE' AND COV.VALUE = 'old') UNION SELECT lv.ID,lv.LOOKUP_TYPE,lv.LOOKUP_CODE,lv.SORT_ORDER,lv.NAME,lv.DESCRIPTION,lv.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM cmn_lookups_v lv WHERE lv.lookup_type = 'CMN_LIC_RIGHT_TYPE' AND lv.lookup_code in ('other') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cmn_sec_groups WHERE lic_right_type='other')
